wennappuwa pradeshaya bharawa siti sahakara pelis adhikari erik perera ge sthana maruwa sambandhayen thamanta ella wana chodana prathikshepa karana bawa rajya amathya arundika pranandu pawasanawa.kolambaadi ada prawruththi sakachchawak kandawamin amathyawaraya sandahan kale, thaman adala sahakara polis adhikariwarayage waradi kriya kalapayan sambandhayen parikshanayak sidukara sthana maruwimak labadena lesa pamanak illa siti bawayi.wennappuwa pradeshaya bharawa siti sahakara polis adhikari erik perera mahatha sthana maru kirima,sambandhayen me wanawita samajaye dadi kathabahak mathuwa thibenawa.ee rajya amathya arundika pranandu mahatha mahajana aarakshawa pilibanda amathya wishramika riyar admiral sarath wirasekara mahathata yomu kala bawa kiyawena lipiyak samaja madhyaye sansaranayawimath samangin. Â 2020 wasare desambar masa 03 wani dina yomu kara athi adala lipiyen wennappuwa hitapu sahakara polis adhikariwarayata allas laba ganim, heroyin saha pathala samajikayan samanga samipa sabandatha pawathwima yana chodana ella kara thibenawa.mema lipiyen wadiduratath illa aththe adala sahakara polis adhikariwaraya saha thawath polis niladharin kihipadeneku sambandhayen parikshanayak sidukara halawatha mathiwarana kottasayen baharata sthana maruwak labadena lesayi.ema sahakara polis adhikariwaraya pasugiya marthu masa 29 wanida migamuwa kottasayata sthana mara kara thibuna.ema siddhin malawa atharathura rajya amathya arundika pranandu saha sahakara polis adhikari erik perera yana mahathwarun athara 2020 pebarawari masayedi wennappuwa pradeshiya sambandhikarana kamituwedi athi wu kathabahaka handa patayak da karaliyata paminiya.thamanta ella wana chodanawalata pilithuru labadimata rajya amathya arundika pranandu kolambaa di prawruththi sakachchawak kandawa thibuna.sahakara polis adhikari erik pranandu wennappuwa pradeshayen maru kirima sambandhayen wishaya bhara amathya wishramika riyar admiral sarath wirasekara mahatha pala kale mewan adahasak.

dewiyanwahanse ee yahapath bawa dutuseka. 26 thawada dewiyanwahanse : apage swarupayen apage samanathwaya lesa manushyaya sadamha; owhu muhude mathsyayan kerehida aakashaye pakshin kerehida thirisanun kerehida mulu polowa kerehida polowa pita badaga yana siyallan kerehida aandukerethwayi kiseka. 27 dewiyanwahanse thaman swarupayen manushyaya mawuseka, dewiyanwahansege swarupayen ohu mawuseka; purushayada sthaà·Šriyada kota owun mawuseka. 28 dewiyanwahanse owunta aashirwadakalaseka; dewiyanwahanse owunta kiyanasek: numbaala bowi wadiwemin polowa purnakota eeka yatathkaraganiw; muhude mathsyayan kerehida aakashaye pakshin kerehida polowa pita hasirena siyalu sathun kerehida adhipathikam karawyayi kiseka. 29 thawada dewiyanwahanse: balawa, mulu polothalayehi athi bija darana siyalu palada bija darana pala athi siyalu wrukshayanda numbaalata dunimi; eya numbaalata aahara pinisa wanneya. 30 polowe siyalu mrugayantath aakashaye siyalu pakshintath pelowa pita badaga yana pana athi siyalu sathuntath aahara pinisa siyalu nil pala dunimiyi kiseka.
